medical_history.chief_complaint: Diagnosis of breast cancer at age 37 years.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Ms E noted some pain under her armpit which progressed, and within 6 weeks, a lump in her left axilla increased in size. She had a mammogram that did not initially detect the cancer, but MRI and ultrasound confirmed its presence.
medical_history.past_medical_history: A history of breast cancer diagnosed at age 37, mitral valve prolapse, and a BRCA1 mutation (5382insC).
medical_history.family_history: No known family history of breast or ovarian cancer. Father was adopted; biological mother died of tuberculosis. Father died at age 55 from complications after a cholecystectomy. Mother is alive and healthy at 64.
medical_history.social_history: Works in the banking business, is married, does not smoke, and drinks alcohol infrequently.
